mapper.select: select * from USERS where user_id = #{id} and user_pw = MD5(#{password})

select s.store_name, s.store_seq, s.category_seq, AVG(r.score) AS AverageRating, COUNT(r.title) AS ReviewCount, mi.img_filename AS STORE_IMG FROM USERS m INNER JOIN INTEREST i ON m.user_id = i.user_id INNER JOIN STORES s ON i.store_seq = s.store_seq LEFT JOIN REVIEWS r ON s.store_seq = r.store_seq LEFT JOIN STORE_IMG mi ON s.store_seq = mi.store_seq where m.user_id = #{id} GROUP BY s.store_name, s.category_seq, mi.img_filename
